column1: A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Thursday June 18
column2: 2015 at 10 o'clock A.M. from SS. Peter & Paul R.C.C. Parish of St. John XXIII located at 301 Pine Street Tamaqua
column3: Pennsylvania 18252.. This mass will be co-celebrated with that of his beloved grandmother Theresa A. Hankey who preceded him in death on Saturday June 13
column4: 2015.  Private Interment will be in SS. Cyril & Methodius R.C.C. Cemetery
